mapper.update: update xx_invoice set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invoice_date = #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, billing_address = #{billingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billing_city = #{billingCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billing_state = #{billingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billing_country = #{billingCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billing_postalCode = #{billingPostalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER} where invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_date, billing_address, billing_city, billing_state, billing_country, billing_postalCode, total from xx_invoice where invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_date, billing_address, billing_city, billing_state, billing_country, billing_postalCode, total from xx_invoice
